    A EngineRestGitLab class

    EngineRestGitLab.Rd

    A class for methods wrapping GitLab's REST API responses.

    Super class

    GitStats::EngineRest -> EngineRestGitLab

    Methods

    Public methods

    • EngineRestGitLab$pull_repos()

    • EngineRestGitLab$pull_repos_supportive()

    • EngineRestGitLab$pull_repos_contributors()

    • EngineRestGitLab$pull_commits()

    • EngineRestGitLab$clone()

    Inherited methods

    • GitStats::EngineRest$check_organizations()

    • GitStats::EngineRest$initialize()

    • GitStats::EngineRest$response()

    Method pull_repos()

    A method to retrieve all repositories for an organization in a table format.

    Usage

    EngineRestGitLab$pull_repos(org, settings)

    Arguments

    org

    A character, a group of projects.

    settings

    A list of GitStats settings.

    Returns

    A table.

    Method pull_repos_supportive()

    An empty method to satisfy engine iterator.

    Usage

    EngineRestGitLab$pull_repos_supportive(org, settings)

    Arguments

    org

    An organization.

    settings

    A list of GitStats settings.

    Returns

    Nothing.

    Method pull_repos_contributors()

    A method to add information on repository contributors.

    Usage

    EngineRestGitLab$pull_repos_contributors(repos_table)

    Arguments

    repos_table

    A table of repositories.

    Returns

    A table of repositories with added information on contributors.

    Method pull_commits()

    GitLab private method to derive commits from repo with REST API.

    Usage

    EngineRestGitLab$pull_commits(
  org,
  date_from,
  date_until = Sys.date(),
  settings
)

    Arguments

    org

    A character, a group of projects.

    date_from

    A starting date to look commits for.

    date_until

    An end date to look commits for.

    settings

    A list of GitStats settings.

    Returns

    A table of commits.

    Method clone()

    The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

    Usage

    EngineRestGitLab$clone(deep = FALSE)

    Arguments

    deep

    Whether to make a deep clone.
